website_summaries.verdict: A wonderful glider and ottoman set for nursing or everyday relaxing at home.
pros: Features a multi-position mechanism that locks the glider in six different positions and makes it easy to sit in or step out of the glider
Thick cushions and padded arms add class and elegance to a setting's decor
cons: Fabric upholstery leaves much to be desired
More expensive than comparable glider and ottoman sets

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that this was not constructed as well as the same make and model we tested at Babies R Us. The arm rest pads are connected with Velcro rather than buttons (babies r us version). So they are constantly slipping and falling off- very frustraging. Additionally, the ottoman is different. Doesn't have the tilted foot pad as the one at babies RUs, and is also extremely light weight, so if your foot weight is not evenly distributed, it tips over. Also super frustrating and potentially dangerous!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for moms!!
customer_reviews.text: You guys, 16 months in, and i am still IN LOVE with this chair and ottoman. Whenever i travel anywhere overnight with my daughter, i find myself missing our glider more than words can say. I highly recommend this purchase- I used it almost constantly when i was nursing (with a pillow under my little one), and still use it for naps and bedtime. It is amazingly comfortable (I have fallen asleep here many times), and so easy to rock. Hubby and I are looking forward to moving it to our tv room when the nursery is no longer a "nursery."
customer_reviews.author: Julie Christy Kenyon

customer_reviews.title: Great recliner! Perfect for the nursery
customer_reviews.text: Great recliner! Perfect for the nursery. Bought a cheaper one at target that didn't recline and it was uncomfortable- returned it and got this one. So glad I paid a little extra for this gem but didn't break the bank. This has everything I was looking for- comfy cushions, wide and high enough (although I'm 5'4" 130 lbs but works for my hubby too who is 5'11"), both the chair and ottoman rock, and did I mention it reclines??
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like new after 3 years
customer_reviews.text: I have had this chair for 3 years. We use it every night to rock babies to sleep or read stories. As from my pictures, you can see it is still like new. It rocks smoothly, was simple to assemble, and is very comfortable. I like that you can recline and still rock. The cushions have held up amazing. You can't even tell it has been used. Definitely recommend. It is worth the price if you are going to be using it for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Kempfe

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was really easy - just required attaching the base of the chair ...
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was really easy - just required attaching the base of the chair to the seat, the base of the ottoman to the cushion, and then snapping the cushions on the chair. It is very good quality, looks great and is very comfortable. I bought this for my wife who is now 6 months pregnant, and she says it's the only place she is comfortable. We're really glad we got the one with the recliner. She uses that all the time.
customer_reviews.author: B. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow to use boppy in to breast feed.
customer_reviews.text: For the price the chair and seat pad seems low quality. Arm rests are uncomfortable. The seat is very narrow too. I can’t sit in it with my boppy pillow to feed my baby. Very disappointed in my rocker selection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't have stationary foot rest, slightly smaller than same in stores.
customer_reviews.text: Good sleigh chair. But this one is narrower than the same model I tested in the store. It also did NOT come with the shown rubber foot rest, however the foot rocker is made for one. So I may have just order it separately. Everything else is the same as the items we tested in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Brian L

customer_reviews.title: The second glider arrived perfect! We love the recline feature and that you ...
customer_reviews.text: Our first glider arrived broken, but Amazon sent us a replacement and arranged a pick up of the broken one since we don't have a car big enough to fit the huge box! The second glider arrived perfect! We love the recline feature and that you can recline and glide at the same time. it has a bit of a narrow seat (smaller than the ones we tried at Babies R Us) but we have a smaller room and are not big people so it works for us! The price was much better on Amazon too
customer_reviews.author: IBProctor

customer_reviews.title: Love the recliner and glider combo
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! I love that it reclines and that you can still glide while the chair is in the reclined position. (we almost bought another recliner that had a built-in footstool, but you couldn't glide when the footstool was kicked out!). I heard good reviews of this chair before giving birth, and now that I have been using it with my baby for the past 11 days, I wholeheartedly agree that it is a wonderful chair for nursing! I "splurged" on this, and I am really glad that I did!
customer_reviews.author: Susanna O.

customer_reviews.title: Glad i bought in my 2nd trimester..also a treat for pregnancy before baby feeding
customer_reviews.text: Great yourself to this glider before the baby comes, your pregnant back and body will thank you. So soft and comfortable but offers me back support that I'm lacking sitting on my couch which is becoming more evident as I get further into my 3rd trimester. Glides effortlessly. Reclines and locks in place if you need which will be handy for feeding.
customer_reviews.author: WexAmz

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this glider. It is very comfortable and quiet. It's been the perfect chair for with my newborn. I was getting lots of back pain while nursing before I had this chair. It makes a huge difference. I wish I had it when my first child was a baby. One thing to note - I was sent the wrong color. I was sent the white frame light grey cushions. We ended up really liking the color and decided to keep it rather than switch for the chocolate brown.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel B.

customer_reviews.title: ... using for 6 months now and it has been great. No issues
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for 6 months now and it has been great. No issues. I like the high back. It is somewhat narrow so great for a small nursery. I wouldn’t recommend for wide people, though.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca A.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: We love the ability to glide and recline. It withstood a cross country move and still works perfectly. We are glad we spent the extra money for a quality glider as we spend a lot of time in it. I am 5'3" and my husband is 6' and we both can use it with equal comfort. That was key for us.
customer_reviews.author: KJC1

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Wow. As a first time mom, I didn’t realize how important the nursery chair is. I’m so glad we didn’t skimp on the chair! This chair is worth every penny. I especially appreciated the comfy seat for postpartum comfort. At times, I live in this chair. Sometimes I sit in it just because since it’s so comfy! My husband assembled it and he said it was much easier than the mini crib we bought. Don’t skimp on the nursery chair!! I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: nice glider for tall parents
customer_reviews.text: I bought this glider as a gift for my son and his wife. They love it!! She is 5'10 and he is 6'2. They like that it has a tall back so they can rest their heads while feeding or rocking the baby. They also like that it can lock so as child grows no pinched fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This glider is perfect
customer_reviews.text: This glider is perfect. My wife and I purchased this glider 5 months ago and I couldn't imagine not owning this wonderful chair. My wife can instantly get our 8 month old to sleep, I however need this chair. It has a very smooth reclining operation that is very easily manipulated with only your legs, and it is extremely quiet.
customer_reviews.author: NW

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This chair is very expensive for the quality of material. Purchased it for our nursery and when assembling, I immediately noticed it’s made of very cheap parts even though it’s an over $400 chair. It’s also fine for rocking, but way too small for breastfeeding comfortably (and I’m a petite person to begin with so I can’t imagine how others manage).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value! Most used item we purchased!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for feeding my baby or sitting in while pumping. Super comfy and even fits my 6'2" husband. This is the most used item we have after having our baby and WELL worth the purchase. I sometimes find myself sitting in it almost all day long - pumping, feeding, and holding a fussy baby can take up a lot of time! Now I'm comfortable while doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Can't imagine a better chair
customer_reviews.text: The chair is super comfortable and relaxing. It slides with the foot rest (both slide) and the chair reclines. It worths every penny. There could be small chips and imperfections with the paint, due to packaging and shipping, but no major damage made us keep the chair. We highly recommend it. Planning to make another review after using it for baby time.
customer_reviews.author: Gizmo

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very small in the hip area. Had to return it
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: I Love It
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this glider daily for about 18 months now and I am consistently happy to have it. The gliding is so smooth, it is very easy to recline, and I've slept in it dozens of times when necessary. I do wish it were wider, but otherwise have no complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: SuzyZuu

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable  & easy to use .
customer_reviews.text: I received one as a baby shower gift 23 years ago. Loved it so much we got my daughter in law one for her baby shower. The best part it has Multipositions now. Very easy to put together. 4 screws for chair and 4 screws for the ottoman .
customer_reviews.author: Soccer  Mom 47

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, comfy and fits both mom and dad
customer_reviews.text: Love this rocker!! Super comfy, well-made and glides amazingly. Also like that is reclines easily. Also fits my husband who is 6' 2" where most other rockers had too short of a back.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: The chair was pretty easy to put together but it did arrive damaged
customer_reviews.text: The chair was pretty easy to put together but it did arrive damaged. I fixed it myself with some gorilla glue because I didn't want to have to wait for a new one to arrive. But I contacted them about it anyway. Waiting to hear back. I am dissapointed with the color I ordered though. I went with grey. For my nursery I think light grey would have been better
customer_reviews.author: Saustin87

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Received this chair today. Opened the box to damage, torn fabric, and pieces that aren’t even fully painted.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Instructions about side levers isn't clear as to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Instructions about side levers isn't clear as to which side is which and I put them on backward. Have to push lever down instead of lifting up.
customer_reviews.author: HAlbrecht

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable chair for the nursery
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to finish the assembly since it was packaged almost fully assembled. This has been great for our nursery - clean, smooth glide, perfect amount of recline and very comfortable to sit in. Baby easily falls asleep with the glide. Having the ottoman glide as well was something I didn't think mattered, but it really does add more comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. Doesn’t take up a lot of space. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Keim

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: This seemed like a very expensive purchase and there were so many chairs that were cheaper. I have felt the chairs at other people's places and there is a clear difference in the cushions and arm rest... there is a reason for the price. Solid wood and cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my pregnant daughter. It looks lovely in the nursery. Now that the baby has arrived it is been put to the test. Oh my goodness, it is so comfortable, that someone is always sitting or sleeping in it!The new Mom loves it for nursing and soothing her precious baby, day or night.
customer_reviews.author: Annie-Ree

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: I got this chair for our new grandson. It's been used a lot over the past year and we couldn't be happier with it. It's comfortable and easy to get in and out. The parents aren't small people and it's held up over countless hours of rocking.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Decent chair-some small flaws.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy chair. Easy to assemble. The pads from the arm rests don't like to stay in place. The white paint is not evenly applied to the wood there are areas where you can see a good bit of wood.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and looks great
customer_reviews.text: This glider works great in our nursery and is so comfortable. I really like the reclining feature and it was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, nice high back for taller people
customer_reviews.text: Made well, glides smooth, comfortable, nice high back for taller people, soft fabric, and I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality expected
customer_reviews.text: This was the 2nd glider we purchased of the same make that came with a small split in the wood frame on the right side below the armrest. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfortable and well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This rocker-glider is beautiful, so well made and so comfortable. Well worth the extra money to get this high quality set.
customer_reviews.author: KarenAZ

customer_reviews.title: Tight on thicker thighs
customer_reviews.text: We really like it, but I have thicker thighs and this one is tight around that area. Even not pregnant this glider would be a little too narrow for my comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Nice,  but too pricey for what it offers
customer_reviews.text: My favorite thing about this glider is the ability to recline back. However, I think it was too pricey because it's very similar to other cheaper products in my opinion, but they don't have the recline option. Getting the glider footrest is also a must!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this glider when it arrived
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this glider when it arrived. It was easy to put together and looked great! I didn’t use it before my daughter and as born and she is now two months old. The glider is very comfortable but I’m very disappointed with the quality of the paint. It is already chipping away. I’m nervous to see what it will look like in two more months.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Schueller

customer_reviews.title: A great nursing chair
customer_reviews.text: A great nursing chair! Reasonably easy to put together. Silent glide. Have only had it a few months so can't comment on longevity but so far very happy with it. Worth the extra $$ when you are in need of a comfortable chair at 3 in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: NinaG

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Though pricey, this rocker is worth every penny. All the features you need (recline, glide and a lock for both) and the comfort you want. My husband is 6'4" and this rocker is tall enough for him to sit comfortably for long periods. Which you'll do with an infant. I'm currently in the chair while my 2 month old son sleeps on my chest. 2 hours and counting...it's paid for itself already.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rocks while reclined!!! The only chair I've seen that can rock while fully reclined.
customer_reviews.text: Rocks while reclined!!! The only chair I've seen that can rock while fully reclined. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Anna B.

customer_reviews.title: Well built and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This is very comfortable chair! I'm over 6 feet tall, over 200 pounds. This chair doesn't even creak when I sit down. Not hard to put together but if you're not good with tools, you better ask a friend to help.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the nursery for 2nd child. Wanted a rocker that reclined and this does the trick. Its a little loud to adjust to the recline, but still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: CrimsonandBlue

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely in love with this chair
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with this chair. My friend recommended it and I was hesitant due to how much it cost, but it was worth every penny. Setup was quick and the reclining feature is worth every penny. Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three years in and still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: After many long nights and using this chair multiple times daily, we continue to be happy with this purchase. Happy with the quality and that we don’t have to think about replacing our glider for baby #2
customer_reviews.author: Meghan P.

customer_reviews.title: We really liked the one we thought was this one as the ...
customer_reviews.text: We tested out this brand of gliders at a big box store. We really liked the one we thought was this one as the picture looked identical to this model. We bought it here because it was significantly cheaper. Unfortunately, this chair was less wide and the extendable foot rest shown in one of the photos doesn't actually come with this chair. All in all, we were disappointed, but she liked this one "enough" we kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Kinger7102

customer_reviews.title: Nice glider
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in time and in perfect condition. Was easy to assemble. Very comfortable cushions. Handles easy to use for the recline and gliding option. The grey fabric color matches well. It is a nice light grey.
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable Chair
customer_reviews.text: The chair is comfortable at the start but not after sitting in it for several hours with my baby. It's also frustrating that the footstool just slides on the carpet when I use it to prop my feet up.
customer_reviews.author: Jylian

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: If you are going to spend hours and hours nursing, then this is the chair you need. Easy assembly and most important, comfort
customer_reviews.author: Serina

customer_reviews.title: This chair is beautiful, and it glides smoothly with no effort
customer_reviews.text: This chair is beautiful, and it glides smoothly with no effort. Mine came with 2 bumps, one really visible on the left arm, and the second on the foot stool. It is an excellent and comfortable chair, but for the price, you would expect better ZERO flaws!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and we love it. Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is now the second Dutailier glider we own, and we love it. Extremely comfortable, seems very durable, super easy assembly...I definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and very comfortable. It fits great in our nursery! After lots of research, my wife and I settled on this rocker. It's been great! The ottoman is very nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Extremely comfortable and quiet. Arrived quickly just as expected
customer_reviews.author: Veronica A.

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair, even better customer service from Dutailier. Stand up company. Stand up chair.
customer_reviews.author: Matt A.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Looks great in my nursery. Was not damaged upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Christiansen

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable but way overpriced for the quality. Cheap wood and materials. Assembly instructions are not clear & pictures worthless. If you don't have the special screwdriver required you can't even assemble it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Arnoux

customer_reviews.title: Love this rocker
customer_reviews.text: Love this rocker, it is so comfortable for both my husband and I. He is 6'2" and appreciates the width and the fact that he can rest his head while rocking, which was not the case with many of the rockets we test-rocked. Worth the investment to get a solid and comfortable rocker. We will be using it daily, for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: kristin k.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: By far the best glider I have tried, the most comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Not the Dutalier Grande but Still Good
customer_reviews.text: I sat in another Dutailier Glider in BabiesRus (Dutailier Moderan Grande Glider) that felt a bit nicer - softer cushion and a bit wider. This particular model, although the cushion is a bit firmer and seat a bit narrower, is still very comfortable. The footstool also seems a little flimsier than I'd expect from this brand. Overall, I'm happy with the chair as it was about $200 less than the Grande model.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great quality. Reclines and glides. 8 months of use and still in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Grace's mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and my wife loves it. what more is there to say?
customer_reviews.author: Ed C. of Jax, fl.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I adore this glider more than anything in our nursery! So comfortable and sturdy! I love the locking setting, since my preschooler is often nearby and I was fearful of him getting his little fingers pinched. The rocking ottoman is awesome, but I do wish it had a lock option too. The only downside to this glider is the price and lack of a storage pocket. Other than those minor details, I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Helen C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for my wife but a little small for me. I'm 6' 220lbs
customer_reviews.author: Josh Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves her Glider and so does her back. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Best Glider
customer_reviews.text: It was wonderful. My wife loves it. It is the best I ever seen and owned.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: durable frame and fabric etc.
customer_reviews.text: smooth glide, easy to assemble. durable chair. the foot rest is not as sturdy as the chair. it does not have a slide out slanted footrest. The fabric is a little scratchy for resting arms, but my elbows got used to it after a couple weeks. This durable fabric makes it easy to keep clean. I do wish it had more lumbar support, like a pillow attachment. I just use a pregnancy wedge pillow for support.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous purchasing this chair because of the price but it was so worth it. The chair is so comfortable that when I was unable to sleep laying down I felt asleep on this chair and slept like a baby. My newborn also loves to be rocked on it by daddy. Definitely recommend this product to all future parents. It is worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Every new parent should have one of these! Quality and comfort. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. Comfortable! Sit in it all the time and my baby isn't even here yet!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT! Not once but twice ...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT! Not once but twice received the glider with broken wood base and arm. WILL NOT try a third time..... NO QUALITY CONTROL and AMAZON has a warehouse of broken gliders apparently. VERY UNHAPPY CUSTOMER and EXPECTING PARENTS.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. Very comfortable and easy to put together (by myself at 8 months pregnant!). Expensive but completely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good chair, but for the money, l expected better. The cushion had an indentation after just a month or two of use. Granted, l was nursing in it all the time, but I thought it should hold up a little better. I am average weight, by the way. What is most annoying are the arm cushions. They attach with Velcro and then there's an awkward, useless flap that hangs down. Inevitably the Velcro comes apart and the cushions rotate so that the Velcro is constantly scratching your skin and catching on clothing. If l had known these things going in, l would have saved some money and bought a cheaper chair.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Mayhall Vandervoort

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY PRODUCT AND EASY TO ASSEMBLE
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, super soft and comfortable fabric. Love it. My only complaint is that the arms do not have pockets under them for storage like some similar Glider chairs, but overall I am very happy with the product and would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Friedland

customer_reviews.title: SO COMFORTABLE! I love this chair and already took a ...
customer_reviews.text: SO COMFORTABLE! I love this chair and already took a nap in it even though baby isn't here yet. It glides and reclines - I love that you can glide in the reclined position. It's also a great size. We have a smaller nursery and it fits great. Assembly was easy (15 minutes - 8 screws) and it's very well made. The chair doesn't make any noises when rocking, which is a huge plus. I am so happy with this chair and can't wait to snuggle with baby in it when he/she arrives next month!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Miller

customer_reviews.title: Anyone who is not super skinny may find it uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The seat of the chair is very narrow. Anyone who is not super skinny may find it uncomfortable. The construction seems to be good so far. I like that it can recline and lock in place. The Ottoman is a good height.
customer_reviews.author: needsomeshoes

customer_reviews.title: ... way too many hours in this recliner but I love it. So comfy while nursing my baby or ...
customer_reviews.text: I've spent way too many hours in this recliner but I love it. So comfy while nursing my baby or just rocking with him while he sleeps. Could flip forward so be aware when standing up. I've never had the problem add long add I pay attention and don't lean all of my weight on the front
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: ... replace an older Dutailier glider that finally developed an annoying squeak. Really loved that old glider
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to replace an older Dutailier glider that finally developed an annoying squeak. Really loved that old glider! This one is no comparison. It's painted wood and foam cushions. I feel I've regressed instead of advancing with some new furniture. The description on line was not too clear.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Pilgrim

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I looked at other retailers for this chair, and they wanted to charge $125 for freight. Amazon shipped it for free and I got it in TWO DAYS. Very easy to assemble, and very functional and attractive. Thinking about buying another because the little guy likes it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Brasky

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together and comfortable. It's a very attractive chair, too!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after using my brothers glider that he purchased several years ago. I love that glider! Sadly this is not the same chair. I bought this expecting it to be wider, but this is extremely narrow. I'm not a huge woman, yet the armrests jam into my thighs. It also doesn't recline as smoothly as my brother's chair does.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price!! Piece of the frame chipped right off the frame one day after assembly. The frame is narrow and rickety. Expected much much more from a Dutalier.
customer_reviews.author: YRM

customer_reviews.title: Just received it yesterday and this glider is so comfortable and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Just received it yesterday and this glider is so comfortable and easy to put together! Can't wait to use it with the baby. My fiancé enjoyed it so much that he wouldn't get out of the chair. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Channing

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Very comfortable. Only complaint is place to put something like a remote or your phone. We can't 'fit a table by our glider so I have nowhere to put anything.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Paxton

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase/Great Price/ Free Shipping on Prime
customer_reviews.text: This Chair is almost identical to the chairs that they sell in Buy Buy Baby. I called the manufacturer in Canada and they told me they make two Models. One is for Retail and the other is for Cyber Purchases. The only difference that my wife and I could see is the $$$. This chair is easy to assemble and is great quality. Buy Buy Baby would not price match even though it's the identical chair with a different SKU, which is great because this combination was $700 not including the $75 delivery charge in NYC. I have prime, so the delivery was 2 days free shipping !!!!! SR
customer_reviews.author: Stephen D. Ruggieri

customer_reviews.title: This glider packaged well and it was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This glider packaged well and it was easy to put together. We love the look and the gliding motion is very quiet! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: James H Kim

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable chair. My son doesn't care to be rocked in it now as a newborn, but I am sure it will get a ton of use as he gets older
customer_reviews.author: Sam

product_meta.title: Dutailier SLEIGH 0367 Glider Multiposition-lock Recline with Ottoman Included
product_meta.description: Color:Recline and Ottoman Combo| Size:Light GreyThe Sleigh Glider and ottoman combo stands out with a design inspired by the curves and details of an antique sledge. This ultra-resistant glider chair is handcrafted in FSC-certified hardwood in Canada by our skilled craftsmen. Dutailier's exclusive gliding system with top quality sealed ball bearings provides a smooth and long horizontal gliding motion; which sets us apart from everyone in our category. The glider chair comes with pre-camber seat design with integrated elastic membrane for maximum seating relaxation. It also features an exclusive multi-position lock mechanism that allows you to sit back or get up safely while holding a baby in your arms. The 45° reclining backrest mechanism is easily activated by the simple pressure of your body. You can then rock effortlessly lying down and easily fall asleep in the reclined position. Cushions are made of high-density polyurethane foam with polyester fiber for superior lumbar support and to avoid compression for optimal comfort over a long seating time. (Seating dimension with cushion: 19", backrest length with cushion: 27") Enjoy the added benefit this ottoman provides with extra support to your back and knees as well as your feet when gliding in tandem with your Dutailier glider. Your family's safety is our priority therefore we made sure our furniture meets the most stringent Canadian and USA safety standards (CAL117 and TSCA) especially no flame retardants and no carcinogenic products. We stand proudly behind our products with a 5 year limited warranty.
feature_bullets: PERFECT. First choice for new parents looking for premium quality, safety and great value.
SMOOTH. Dutailier offers exclusive gliding system with top quality sealed ball bearings.
EASY. Comes pre-assembled, only 4 screws plus cushions and you are ready to enjoy your precious moments.
STEADY. Multiposition-lock mechanism allows to stop the glider at the desired position.
ADJUSTABLE. Great 45° reclining mechanism allows backrest to be fully adjustable.
COMFORTABLE. High-density cushions that do not sag. Comfortable padded armrests. Can accommodate the majority of breastfeeding cushions.
BUILT TO LAST. Ultra-resistant glider chair made of hardwood. Handcrafted in Canada using the highest quality materials and backed by a 5 year limited warranty.
OTTOMAN. Provides extra support to your back and knees as well as your feet when gliding in tandem.
